summary.span: 表示几何图形的一个子部分、一系列单独连接的二维几何线段。

span.span: Represents a subsection of a geometry, a single connected series of two-dimensional geometric segments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 类表示的一个或多个图形组成 。A is made up of one or more figures, represented by the class. 每个图形本身由类定义的一个或多个段组成 。Each figure is itself made up of one or more segments, defined by the class. ## XAML 对象元素用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` -or-   oneOrMoreSegments ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `oneOrMoreSegments` 派生自的对象的一个或多个对象元素 。One or more object elements for objects that derive from . 通常为： 、Typically these are: , , , , , , ., , , , , .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于动画和曲线段参数，平展过程会丢失。The flattening process is lossy with respect to animation and curve segment parameters. `tolerance` 确定曲线的近似程度。`tolerance` determines how closely the curve is approximated.

summary.span: 获取或设置该 的包含区域是否用于命中测试、呈现和剪辑。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the contained area of this is to be used for hit-testing, rendering, and clipping.

value.span: 确定该 的包含区域是否用于命中测试、呈现和剪辑。

span.span: Determines whether the contained area of this is to be used for hit-testing, rendering, and clipping.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `false` ，则仅使用的轮廓 ，其包含区域不会影响的整个区域 。If this property is set to `false`, then only the outline of the will be used, and its contained area will not contribute to the overall area of the . 此属性的一个用途是允许以其他形式填充的空心笔划 ，如下面左侧笑脸中的嘴。One use of this property is to allow unfilled strokes in an otherwise filled , like the mouth in the left Smiley below. 将嘴设置 为 `true` 可能会在右侧笑脸中产生不理想的嘴效果。Setting the mouth's to `true` may produce the undesired effect of the mouth in the right Smiley. ![smiley 路径已填充](~/add/media/ref-mil-pathfigure-isfilled-smiley.PNG "smiley 路径已填充")![smiley path is filled](~/add/media/ref-mil-pathfigure-isfilled-smiley.PNG "smiley path is filled") IsFilled 示例IsFilled Example ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法生成一系列移动和绘制命令;有关这些命令的格式的详细信息，请参阅 [路径标记语法](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/path-markup-syntax) 概述。This method produces a series of move and draw commands; for more information about the format of these commands, see the [Path Markup Syntax](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/path-markup-syntax) overview.
